notes.text:
Use whatever vegetables you have on hand
Add spinach at the end for extra nutrition
Make it spicy with fresh chilies

steps.descr: Sauté onion until soft, add curry powder

on_enter.say: Right, let's start by sautéing the onion until it's nice and soft. Then, we'll add that lovely curry powder for a burst of flavour!

steps.instructions: Sauté onion until soft, add curry powder

steps.descr: Add all vegetables, stir to coat in spices

on_enter.say: Now, let's toss in all those beautiful vegetables. Give them a good stir to coat them in those aromatic spices.

steps.instructions: Add all vegetables, stir to coat in spices

steps.descr: Pour in coconut milk and 200ml water

on_enter.say: Let's pour in the creamy coconut milk and 200ml of water. This will create a lovely sauce for our curry.

steps.instructions: Pour in coconut milk and 200ml water

steps.descr: Simmer for 20 minutes until vegetables are tender

on_enter.say: Time to let it simmer for 20 minutes. You'll know it's ready when the vegetables are beautifully tender.

steps.instructions: Simmer for 20 minutes until vegetables are tender

steps.descr: Add chickpeas and cook 5 more minutes

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the chickpeas and give it another 5 minutes. This will make the curry nice and hearty.

steps.instructions: Add chickpeas and cook 5 more minutes

on_enter.say: Let's season our curry with a pinch of salt. Taste and adjust to your liking!

steps.descr: Garnish with fresh coriander, serve with rice or naan

on_enter.say: Time to garnish with some fresh coriander and serve it up with rice or naan. Enjoy your delicious homemade curry!

steps.instructions: Garnish with fresh coriander, serve with rice or naan

recipe.title: Vegetable Curry
recipe.description: Hearty Indian curry packed with seasonal vegetables
